```go
package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io/ioutil"
    "net/http"
)

func main() {
    client := &http.Client{}

    var jsonStr = []byte(`{
  "style": "default",
  "customer_id": 4340,
  "start_date": "2023-10-03",
  "end_date": "2023-10-03",
  "invoice_number": "",
  "gross_amount": 18000,
  "discount_amount": 0,
  "amount_due": 18000,
  "items": [
    {
      "product_id": 1692,
      "description": "",
      "unit_price": 0,
      "applied_taxes": [],
      "invoice_quantity": 1,
      "tax_amount": 0,
      "invoice_amount": 0,
      "amount_due": 0,
      "discount_amount": 0
    }
  ],
  "note": "",
  "tag": "",
  "logo_size": "270.0px",
  "logo_position": "left",
  "invoice_color": "#6BB632",
  "extra_headers": [
    {
      "label": null,
      "value": null
    }
  ],
  "fx_amount": 18594.225,
  "fx_rate": 1,
  "base_currency": "GHS",
  "fx_currency": "GHS"
}`)
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v3/invoices", bytes.NewBuffer(jsonStr))
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    req.Header = map[string][]string{
        "Accept": {"application/json"},
"Authorization": {"Bearer {{token}}"}
    }
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Println(string(body))
}
```

```js
const axios = require("axios");

axios({
  method: "GET",
  url: "/api/v3/search-invoices?term=Inv123",
  headers: {
    Accept: "application/json",
    Authorization: "Bearer {{token}}",
  },
  params: {
    term: "Inv123",
  },
})
  .then((response) => console.log(response.data))
  .catch((error) => console.error(error));
```

```go
package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io/ioutil"
    "net/http"
)

func main() {
    client := &http.Client{}

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v3/search-invoices?term=Inv123", nil)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    req.Header = map[string][]string{
        "Accept": {"application/json"},
"Authorization": {"Bearer {{token}}"}
    }
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Println(string(body))
}
```

```php
<?php

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

use GuzzleHttpClient;

$client = new Client();

try {
    $response = $client->request("GET", "/api/v3/search-invoices?term=Inv123", [
        'headers' => [
            "Accept" => "application/json",
            "Authorization" => "Bearer {{token}}"
        ],
        'query' => {
  "term": "Inv123"
},

    ]);

    echo $response->getBody();
} catch (Exception $e) {
    echo "Error: " . $e->getMessage();
}
?>
```

### Filter Invoices

<div class="api-content">

<div class="table-content no-scrollbar">

#### Headers

<table>
  <tbody>
<tr>
                <td style="text-align:left">Authorization
                  <div class="table-description">string</div>
                </td>
                <td style="text-align:left">Set value to <code>Bearer SECRET_KEY</code></td>
              </tr>  </tbody>
</table>

#### Body params

<table>
  <tbody>
<tr>
          <td style="text-align:left">startdate
            <div class="table-description">date</div>
          </td>
          <td style="text-align:left">Start date to filter from using the start date of invoices
            </td>
        </tr><tr>
          <td style="text-align:left">enddate
            <div class="table-description">date</div>
          </td>
          <td style="text-align:left">End date to filter to using the start date of invoices
            </td>
        </tr><tr>
          <td style="text-align:left">due_startdate
            <div class="table-description">date</div>
          </td>
          <td style="text-align:left">Start date to filter from using the end date of invoices
            </td>
        </tr><tr>
          <td style="text-align:left">due_enddate
            <div class="table-description">date</div>
          </td>
          <td style="text-align:left">End date to filter to using the end date
            </td>
        </tr><tr>
          <td style="text-align:left">type
            <div class="table-description">string</div>
          </td>
          <td style="text-align:left">Type of invoices to get. Can be recurring or copy
            </td>
        </tr><tr>
          <td style="text-align:left">paid_status
            <div class="table-description">string</div>
          </td>
          <td style="text-align:left">Payment status of the invoice. Can be Paid, Paid Part or Not Paid
            </td>
        </tr></tbody>
</table><span class="info-card">All fields are optional</span>

```js
const axios = require("axios");

axios({
  method: "POST",
  url: "/api/v3/filter-invoices",
  headers: {
    Authorization: "Bearer {{token}}",
  },

  data: {
    startdate: "",
    enddate: "",
    due_startdate: "",
    due_enddate: "",
    type: "",
    paid_status: "",
  },
})
  .then((response) => console.log(response.data))
  .catch((error) => console.error(error));
```

```go
package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io/ioutil"
    "net/http"
)

func main() {
    client := &http.Client{}

    var jsonStr = []byte(`{
  "startdate": "",
  "enddate": "",
  "due_startdate": "",
  "due_enddate": "",
  "type": "",
  "paid_status": ""
}`)
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v3/filter-invoices", bytes.NewBuffer(jsonStr))
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    req.Header = map[string][]string{
        "Authorization": {"Bearer {{token}}"}
    }
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Println(string(body))
}
```

```php
}
```

```js
const axios = require("axios");

axios({
  method: "GET",
  url: "/api/v3/invoices/summary",
  headers: {
    Accept: "application/json",
    Authorization: "Bearer {{token}}",
  },
})
  .then((response) => console.log(response.data))
  .catch((error) => console.error(error));
```

```go
package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io/ioutil"
    "net/http"
)

func main() {
    client := &http.Client{}

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v3/invoices/summary", nil)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    req.Header = map[string][]string{
        "Accept": {"application/json"},
"Authorization": {"Bearer {{token}}"}
    }
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Println(string(body))
}
```

```js
const axios = require("axios");

axios({
  method: "GET",
  url: "/api/v3/paid-invoices",
  headers: {
    Accept: "application/json",
    Authorization: "Bearer {{token}}",

})
```

```go
package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io/ioutil"
    "net/http"
)

func main() {
    client := &http.Client{}

    req, err := http.NewRequest("GET", "/api/v3/paid-invoices", nil)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    req.Header = map[string][]string{
        "Accept": {"application/json"},
"Authorization": {"Bearer {{token}}"}
    }
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
```

```go
package main

import (
    "bytes"
```

```go
    "io/ioutil"
    "net/http"
)

func main() {
    client := &http.Client{}

    var jsonStr = []byte(`{
  "style": "default",
  "customer_id": 4340,
  "start_date": "2023-10-03",
  "end_date": "2023-10-03",
  "invoice_number": "",

      "invoice_quantity": 1,

      "label": null,
      "value": null
    }
  ],
  "fx_amount": 18594.225,
  "fx_rate": 1,
  "base_currency": "GHS",
  "fx_currency": "GHS"
}`)
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v3/invoices/:invoice", bytes.NewBuffer(jsonStr))
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    req.Header = map[string][]string{
        "Accept": {"application/json"},
"Authorization": {"Bearer {{token}}"}
    }
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Println(string(body))
}
```

```js
const axios = require("axios");
```

```go
package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io/ioutil"
    "net/http"
)

func main() {
    client := &http.Client{}

    var jsonStr = []byte(`{
  "invoice_id": 3231,
  "send_tome": false,
  "other_emails": ""
}`)
    req, err := http.NewRequest("POST", "/api/v3/invoices/share", bytes.NewBuffer(jsonStr))
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    req.Header = map[string][]string{
        "Accept": {"application/json"},
"Authorization": {"Bearer {{token}}"}
    }
    resp, err := client.Do(req)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Println(err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Println(string(body))
}
```
